display_name: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale: Over the past 2 weeks, I could not get "going".
description:
Item from the CESD Questionnaire. [Radloff, L. S. (1977)](https://doi.org/10.1177/014662167700100306)

Original Text: Please rate the following symptoms for the past two (2) weeks.
